title: Booking.com
description: Booking.com, a leader in online travel reservations, is distinguished by its vibrant color palette. The brand predominantly features a deep blue color (003A9A and 003B95) symbolizing trust and reliability, complemented by a lively yellow (FDB812) for optimism, along with a dark gray (585856) for balance. These colors are well-documented and consistent across its branding materials.
